page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: My name is Caroline Nathan a 4th year student at Holsworthy Comprehensive school.I wake up at approximately 8AM ,after getting dressed and washed I have a cup of tea and some toast before leaving the house to catch the school bus at 8:30 AM.The school bus takes about 25 mins to travel the 10 miles to school. The school day begins with registation,and at 9:35AM normal lessons commence.The normal school day ends at 3:45PM and during this time 8 lessons are conducted with lunchbreak from 12:10PM to 1:20PM At 3:45PM the school bus carries us back to my village.Once i reach home I have a cup of coffee and watch T.V. until 5:00PM when it is time to prepare tea for my two brothers,dad and step mother.After tea i again watch T.V. or take the dog for a walk.Before bedtime I feed my cat & dog and go to sleep.
